description: This file defines Kotlin data classes for the data models used in a food delivery app, including models for Restaurant, MenuCategory, MenuItem, and CartLine, which represent core entities displayed on the app's UI and used within business logic.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Represents a restaurant shown on the Home screen, with properties like id, name, cuisine tags, rating, estimated time, and banner color.

classes.name: MenuCategory
classes.description: Represents a menu category within a restaurant, with id and title.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a menu item that users can add to their cart, including details such as id, restaurantId, categoryId, name, description, price in cents, and vegetarian flag.

classes.name: CartLine
classes.description: Represents a cart line item consisting of a MenuItem and a quantity.
